description: The separation of the basement of 60 Thornhill Square from the remainder of the property and the formation of a linking door in the party wall linking it with 59 Thornhill Square, formation of access stairs in front lightwell of 60, formation of door in wall between the front lighwells of 59 and 60 and other alterations, in connection with the use of the basement of 60 in conjunction with the occupation of 59 as a single dwelling.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  This permission shall operate for the benefit of J & S Rae only and shall not operate for the benefit of the land nor for any other person for the time being having an interest therein. Upon vacation of the property by the named beneficiaries, the two properties of 59 and 60 Thornhill Square shall be reinstated as two separate single family dwelling houses and the vertical divide reinstated with the break through at basement level resealed using matching materials to the original wall as built, the works to be carried out within six months of the date of vacation.

REASON:  The proposed development is contrary to the aims of policy, but the circumstances of the particular case warrant an exception being made for the benefit of the applicant.
